attributes.action: Investigate why the NHS is still employing Katrina Percy.
attributes.additional_details:
further information on this can be found by reading the below news storied
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-37308857
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-3777184/Under-fire-health-trust-created-new-job-ex-chief-executive-resigned.html
attributes.background:
Katrina Percy was the Southern Health chief executive who failed to investigate a number of deaths that occurred under her care.
and now the NHS have given her a completely new non existing position  and paying her the same has she was getting in her previous position which is £240K.
